ValidationRule.description: When User Select RTGS of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then Enter data in Forex Amount
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'RTGS') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c , 'Rupees') , NOT( ISBLANK( FOREX__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting RTGS of Mode PickList and Rupess of Mode Selection Pick List,You cann't enter in Forex Amount
